title: Bellona Platform
text: The Bellona Platform is a submarine geological feature encompassing the <a href="Chesterfield%20Islands">Chesterfield Islands</a> () and <a href="Bellona%20Reefs">Bellona Reefs</a> () west of <a href="New%20Caledonia">New Caledonia</a>. It was once a landmass, which became mostly submerged when sea levels rose at the end of the <a href="Last%20Glacial%20Maximum">Last Glacial Maximum</a>, 20,000 years ago. It might have played a role in the spread of flora and fauna, including humans, in the southwest Pacific.
